name: J.K. Rowling
biography: J.K. Rowling is a British author, best known for writing the Harry Potter series.

name: George Orwell
biography: George Orwell was an English novelist, essayist, journalist, and critic.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
biography: J.R.R. Tolkien was an English writer, best known for the Lord of the Rings trilogy.

name: Agatha Christie
biography: Agatha Christie was an English writer known for her detective novels, particularly those featuring Hercule Poirot and Miss Marple.

name: Haruki Murakami
biography: Haruki Murakami is a contemporary Japanese writer, known for his surreal and magical realist works.
